description: Non-batch prediction requests and their responses

kind.description:
Identifier of this prediction's kind: single
                         predictions use a sigle input map

inputs.description: Map of inputs to use for the prediction

fields.description: List of descriptors for fields used in this message

result.description: Prediction given as a map from field to value

bad_fields.description:
List of ids of input fields with wrong values
                         (single model only).

unknown_fields.description:
List of ids of input fields not present in the model
                         (single model only)

path.description:
A list of the predicates traversed to make the
                         prediction (single model only)

next_predicates.description:
A list of the predicates for children of this node
                         (single model only)

confidence.description:
Probability of correctness for classification
                         and an estimate of the error for regression
                         (single model only)

count.description:
Number of training instances predicting this result
                         (single model only)

total_count.description:
Total number of training instances in the model
                         (single model only)

objective_summary.description:
Distribution for the the prediction
                         (single model only).
